params.officer: Address to be granted loan officer privileges

calculateInterest(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Calculates interest for a given principal, rate, and time period

params.interestRate: Annual interest rate in basis points

calculatePayoffAmount(uint256).details: Calculates the current payoff amount for a loan

returns._0: Total amount needed to pay off the loan

constructor.details: Initializes the contract with token references and protocol parameters

params._maxLoanToValueRatio: Maximum loan-to-value ratio in basis points
params._protocolFeePercentage: Protocol fee percentage in basis points

params.loanId: ID of the loan being auctioned

getActiveLoanForProperty(uint256).details: Gets the active loan ID for a property

returns._0: Loan ID if active, 0 if none

params.loanId: ID of the loan being auctioned

getBorrowerLoans(address).details: Gets all loans for a borrower

getLoanPayments(uint256).details: Gets all payments for a loan

isLoanOfficer(address).details: Checks if an address is a loan officer

returns._0: Whether the address is a loan officer

makeRepayment(uint256).details: Makes a repayment on a loan

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Implementation of IERC721Receiver interface This function is called by the ERC721 contract when a token is transferred to this contract

placeBid(uint256).details: Places a bid in a liquidation auction

params.loanId: ID of the loan being auctioned

params.officer: Address to have loan officer privileges revoked

requestLoan(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Requests a loan using a property as collateral

params.interestRate: Annual interest rate in basis points
params.loanAmount: Amount of the loan in wei
params.propertyId: ID of the property token to use as collateral

returns._0: loanId ID of the created loan request

startLiquidationAuction(uint256,uint256).details: Starts liquidation auction for a defaulted loan

params.auctionDuration: Duration of the auction in seconds
